settings.title: Hair Loss Treatment
settings.subtitle:
Worried about hair loss? Early treatment can go a long way in reducing hair fall and promoting hair growth.

Treatment options available for male pattern baldness, receding hair line and overall thinning.

settings.title: Is your hair loss caused by a condition?
settings.text: Hair loss is often understood to be temporary. But when caused by genetic factors such as male pattern baldness, hair loss can be irreversible. Other factors causing hair loss are stress, vitamin deficiencies and hormonal imbalance.

settings.title: Does hair loss treatment work?
settings.text: Finasteride and Minoxidil are two medications that have been clinically proven to reduce hair fall and promote hair growth. for those suffering from pattern baldness or genetically receding hairlines.

settings.title: of premenopausal women have some evidence of hair loss
settings.text: according to NICE, the onset of hair loss usually begins before the age of 40 with over 10% having some signs of pattern hair loss.

settings.title: of men will eventually be affected by male pattern hair loss
settings.text: according to the Men's Health Forum, two-thirds of all men in the UK are likely to be losing their hair at any one time.
